post_title: SOLD - T206 Buck Herzog NY on shirt SC 150/25 - SGC 6
post_content: For Sale (priced to move) - T206 Buck Herzog SC 150/25 - SGC 6 (high end).  Price includes shipping.  Last weekend a Herzog P150 PSA 6 sold for $600 at REA not inlcuding tax and shipping which probably added another $40-$50 to that cost.  This card is sharper and priced almost 50% lower.  Please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note: NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover ST.
